pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pytket-qir`pytket-qir` is a python package, aimed at interfacing QIR programs with `pytket`.The source code can be found in the corresponding GitHub repository.## Installation`pytket-qir` is tested against Python 3.8, 3.9 and 3.10.The main requirements are:- `pytket`- `pyqir`Standard local installation using `pip`:```shpip install -U .````pytket-qir` has been packaged using `poetry`:```shpoetry install```_N.B._: `pytket-qir` is tested against x86_64 platforms since `pyqir` is not available for arm64.
